sentences: Samantha Clarissa "Sammi" Sanchez (born January 28, 1998) is an American Latin pop singer.
Sanchez was born in San Diego, California, the daughter of Mexican-Americans Lissa and Carlos Sanchez.
At the age of 11, Sanchez's family moved from Las Vegas, Nevada to New York City, New York.
She attended Professional Performing Arts School in Manhattan.
On May 4, 2015, Sanchez released her single "Talk", which she co-wrote with Matthew Tishler and Maria Christensen.
